Translations.Text: U ki ji we ji dil bi a Xuda u pexembere wi bike u kare qenc bike, eme du cara peruya we bidine u me je re roziki rind ji amade kiriye
Geli pireke pexember! eger hun xwe bi parezin tu jineki weki we nabe; veca hun gotine nerm nebejin da ku e di dile wi de nexweþin heye dile wi nebije we, u hun gotina xweþ u pak bejin

U hun di malen xwe de biminin u (gava ji bo hewcetiki hun ji malen xwe derketin ji) wek (dewra) nezaniya peþin hun xwe baþewelayi nekin-xeml u xiþre xwe niþan nedin u hun limej bikin u zekate bidin u peyrewiya Xuda u pexembere wi bikin. Geli maliye (pexember) beguman Xuda hey dixwaze nepakiye ji we bibe-dur bike u we pak u paqij bike
U hun ayete Xuda u hikmete di malen we de tene xwendin di bir binin-ji ber kin. Beguman Xuda hey hurzana ye kurzana ye

Beguman meren musilman u jinen musilman, u meren bawermend u jinen bawermend u meren ji dil perestvan u jinen ji dil perestvan u meren rastgo u jinen rastgo u meren bihnfireh u jinen bihnfireh u meren dilbitirs u jinen dilbitirs u meren qencikar u jinen qencikar u meren rojigirt u jinen rojigirt u meren dawparez u jinen dawparez u meren Xuda pirr di bir tinin u jinen di bir tinin, Xuda ji wan re bexþineki u peruki mezin amade kiriye
